name: Michael Rubenacker
subtitle: Software Engineering Student
description: Hi! I'm a student in Iowa State's Software Engineering degree program. This is my portfolio, to display my special skills and strengths, in the hopes of finding educational and traditional job offers.

title: Known Languages
description: I can confidently program in C, Java, HTML/CSS, & JavaScript. I am also a bit experienced in Python.

title: Objective
description: Currently, I am looking for a Co-op/Internship position to help further my education over Summer 2024. If you'd like to contact me, feel free to text or call me at (319) 415-8542, or email me at rubenacker04@gmail.com

title: Application Development
description: In Software Engineering 309, I am working on a project using Android Studio for app development. My team decided to create a game similar to Monopoly, with our cool theme. This project is not yet complete, but will be included on this page when is it finished.

title: Embedded Systems
description: In Computer Engineering 288, we are using C to write low-level code onto an iRobot. This code allows us to communicate with the robot, use its' sensors, and have it move around. Our final project is a simulation of a rover landing on Mars, needing to navigate around obstacles without any manual control.

title: Web Development
description: In Computer Science 319, we are learning how to use many different tools to manipulate a website's display, create moving parts such as buttons, and use these to call functions or build page elements. This page is an example of many of those tools.
